document.full_text: the top u.s. military officer accused pakistan's intelligence agency of maintaining ties to militants targeting u.s. troops in neighboring afghanistan, during a trip to islamabad on wednesday.
document.title: u.s. military chief, in pakistan, eyes militant ties
lines_and_colors: the top u.s. military officer accused pakistan's intelligence agency of maintaining ties to militants targeting u.s. troops in neighboring afghanistan, during a trip to islamabad on wednesday.
